soft_skills.phrase: Meewerken aan het opbouwen van AI-expertise binnen KWEEKERS.

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes developing and implementing AI agents using specific generative AI technologies like GPT models, LangChain, and LangGraph. This focus on building user-facing applications and agents with LLMs directly aligns with the definition and core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.
